DOC.brief_title: MyoSure Hysteroscopic Tissue Removal System Registry Study
DOC.detailed_description: Between 500 600 subject enrol prospective , multi-center registry study . Approximately 100 case complete office setting , remain 400-500 case complete hospital outpatient ambulatory surgery center . Subjects undergo hysteroscopic tissue removal procedure remove intrauterine polyp submucosal fibroid .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy female 18 65 year age 2 . Subject must able understand , read sign study specific informed consent form nature study fully explain 3 . Subject indicated myomectomy polypectomy 4 . Subject exhibit intrauterine polyp and/or submucous myoma meet one follow criterion . In case subject multiple intrauterine pathology , classification base follow : All polyps All Type 0 , Type 1 Type 2 myoma ≤ 6 cm diameter Polyps plus Type 0 , Type 1 Type 2 myoma ≤6 cm diameter 1 . Subject pregnant 2 . Subject IUD time procedure . A subject may enrol study IUD remove prior treatment procedure 3 . Subject take anticoagulant antiplatelet medication low dose aspirin 4 . Active pelvic inflammatory disease pelvic/vaginal infection 5 . Subject know suspected coagulopathy bleed disorder 6 . Subject history disease increase risk fluid overload ( i.e . significant cardiac , hepatic , renal dysfunction ) 7 .
